nodes.text: Tiems was located within the Tiems system in the Belderone sector of the Outer Rim Territories and was the location of the city of Tiems. During the Galactic Civil War, a ground battle was fought between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire on the planet near the city of Tiems.

Although unnamed in the The Rebel Alliance Sourcebook, The Essential Atlas included a Tiems system, indicating the existence of the planet named Tiems. Jason Fry confirmed that was the intention when compiling the atlas.
